column4: also, if I don't want to use any live cd stuff, is the alternate cd better to install from?
er,if you dont want to start a liveCD, then it's all you can install from
oh, I see.  Yeah, if youre solely installing, grab the liveCD, starts you into an installer, no need to wait for it to boot, etc.
theres no downside to using the alternate CD, well, except its textbased and not purdy GUI stuff.
